-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A very basic SOAP package
--   
--   Wraps a message in SOAP headers and provides a function to POST this
--   message to a URL.
@package shoap
@version 0.2

module Network.Soap
soapPost :: URLString -> [String] -> IO (CurlCode, String)
